What's new in Archiver

Archiver contains new features that makes it even easier and faster to work with archives. Here are some of Archiver’s improvements:

Drag and drop delight
Archiver’s drag and drop capability is back and smarter than ever! Never worry about archive formats again. Just drag your files into the app and watch Archiver take care of the rest. And it gets better: you can drag individual files from archive previews.
Take a quick look
Say goodbye to extracting all files in an archive just to see what’s inside! With Archiver you can preview archives, and extract only the files you need. It’s all just a drag and a drop away.
■
previewing archives
Compress images and audio optimally
Have you ever tried to send an image only to be told that the file is too large? Do your file uploads seem to take forever? Enter Archiver’s very own .archiver format, with which you can compress image and audio files optimally.
■
compressing images and audio files
Tailor to your needs
You can customize Archiver to adapt to your workflow. Choose a default output location, delete archives after extracting them, and show output files in Finder.
■
preferences

Open

Archiver support website
